00028             function                _load_root_dir_cache( $Dirname )
00029             {
00030                   $Data = @file_get_contents( $Dirname.'/../../data/root_dir_cache' );
00031                   if( $Data !== false )
00032                   {
00033                         global      $RootDirCache;
00034                         $RootDirCache = unserialize( $Data );
00035                   }
00036             }
00037

00148             function                __construct()
00149             {
00150                   $Dirname = dirname( __FILE__ );
00151                   
00152                   $this->_load_root_dir_cache( $Dirname );
00153                   $this->_load_package_real_version_cache( $Dirname );
00154                   $this->_load_rewrited_package_cache( $Dirname );
00155                   $this->_load_rewrites_cache( $Dirname );
00156                   $this->_load_package_path_cache( $Dirname );

00160                   $this->_load_full_class_name_cache( $Dirname );
00161                   $this->_load_get_package_cache( $Dirname );
00162                   $this->_load_package_script_paths_cache( $Dirname );

00175             function                drop_core_cache()
00176             {
00177                   $Dirname = dirname( __FILE__ );
00178                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/root_dir_cache' );
00179                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/package_real_version_cache' );
00180                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/rewrited_package_cache' );
00181                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/rewrites_cache' );
00182                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/package_path_cache' );
00183                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/package_relative_path_cache' );
00184                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/top_package_name_cache' );
00185                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/make_full_version_cache' );
00186                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/full_class_name_cache' );
00187                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/get_package_cache' );
00188                   @unlink( $Dirname.'/../../data/package_script_paths_cache' );
00189             }
00190             
00191             function                _save_root_dir_cache( $Dirname )
00192             {
00193                   global $RootDirCacheChanged;
00194                   if( $RootDirCacheChanged )
00195                   {
00196                         global      $RootDirCache;
00197                         file_put_contents( $Dirname.'/../../data/root_dir_cache' , serialize( $RootDirCache ) );
00198                   }
00199             }
00200             
00201             function                _save_package_real_version_cache( $Dirname )
00202             {
00203                   global      $PackageRealVersionCacheChanged;
00204                   if( $PackageRealVersionCacheChanged )
00205                   {
00206                         global      $PackageRealVersionCache;
00207                         file_put_contents( 
00208                               $Dirname.'/../../data/package_real_version_cache' , serialize( $PackageRealVersionCache ) 
00209                         );
00210                   }
00211             }

00319             function                __destruct()
00320             {

00350       function                      _drop_core_cache()
